tags: him turning you into a werewolf
summary: Fenrir Greyback turning you into a werewolf would include
title: Fenrir Greyback turning you into a werewolf would include
body:
( GIF Credit [ X ] )


- Him finding you disturbingly beautiful, and deciding by his own that is a shame that such a beautiful creature have to spend all the life being just a low and depreciable human.

- Him spending long nights spying you, knowing all your movements, and learning as much of you as he can to be ready the day he will decide to attack.

- Him, deep inside, not being sure if you will recover of his bite, not because he could end killing you -he will never blame himself- but because he is not sure such a small and weak creature, for him, could do it.

- Him thinking, the previous days of Full Moon, in what part of your body he is going to sink his teeth, fantasizing about how soft and sweet would be your flesh, and how hard is going to be for him to restrain from eat you literally and completely.

- Him deciding that you are too precious to bite or scratch your face, and decinding that he will bite a part of you that you can conver with your clothes, at least partially, as your shoulder or one of your legs.

- The Full Moon night, him staying near to your path home, just waiting for the Moon to work on him and to you to pass by his side, being over excited and even nervous by the situation and anticipation.

summary: Quote: Again and again, they scored, and again and again, at the other end of the pitch, Ron saved goals with apparent ease. He...
caption:
Quote: Again and again, they scored, and again and again, at the other end of the pitch, Ron saved goals with apparent ease. He was actually smiling now, and when the crowd greeted a particularly good save with a rousing chorus of the old favourite Weasley is our King, he pretended to conduct them from on high. (Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince)

Funko Pop Collection: Number 54 - Ron Weasley on Broom

blog.name: grandstaircase
blog.title: The Grand Staircase
blog.description: In Hogwarts, it is the Grand Staircase that is full of twists and turns and unexpected locations. You never know where the moving stairs will take you. Je m'appelle Amber. My passions lie in the history on the human condition, YA Fantasy, Disney, graphic design, Harry Potter, and photography. I believe in dragons and ghosts and magic, and I don't put up with haters or the ignorant. Other than that, I don't bite. Hard. :-)

title: Pottermore Sorting Tag
body:
When Pottermore was announced, I took the day off work for the first day of entry into the site.  That was back when we didn’t really know what Pottermore was going to be – just an interactive experience for Harry Potter fans.  It was the most exciting thing announced for Potter fans since The Deathly Hallows.  You better believe I was there Day 1.

One of the most fun things about Pottermore has…

View On WordPress

blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: Alecto Lilly I have no idea what went on with you - I missed that drama - but you clearly like each other and should go on a...
question: Alecto Lilly I have no idea what went on with you - I missed that drama - but you clearly like each other and should go on a date or kiss or at least talk to each other. Xxx
answer:
Alecto: She acted like she was ashamed to be with me because she doesn’t want people to know she’s a LESBIAN!

Lily: I’m not a lesbian, I’m possibly bisexual but I told you I’m going to tell my family over the summer so please just be patient with me.  Once my family know, then I’ll be fine telling everyone else.  

Alecto: I’ll believe it when I see it.

Lily: *Sighs*

Alecto: No dates, kisses or talks till then.  I mean it.

Lily: *Rolls her eyes*

Lily: *Sighs*

Alecto: No dates, kisses or talks till then.  I mean it.

Lily: *Rolls her eyes*

Alecto: I’ll believe it when I see it.

Lily: *Sighs*

Lily: *Rolls her eyes*

summary: Antonin you better train that dog to poop and pee outside the dorm, puppies go potty ANYWHERE. I've seen dogs using litter...
question: Antonin you better train that dog to poop and pee outside the dorm, puppies go potty ANYWHERE. I've seen dogs using litter boxes, maybe Shitface could share with Sirius the Kitten? Also, is Shitface male or female?
answer:
Antonin: Wait, I’m expected to train the fucker?  I’ve got NEWTs, fuck having a dog.  I’ll give it to Black.  He likes animals.

Antonin: And I don’t fucking know if it’s a male or a female.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: So Remus you wouldn’t enjoy him flirting with you even a little bit?
